context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and foundational CPR knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain the procedure for recognizing cardiac arrest and performing an emergency assessment in five steps or fewer.
Learners will be able to perform CPR techniques for adults/children with 90% accuracy using a simulation app.
Learners will successfully complete the automated external defibrillator (AED) protocol three consecutive times via a mobile learning module.
Learners will be able to propose role distribution in a team-based emergency scenario within 15 minutes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
